articles.title: Trump tariffs live: Asian markets drop further as Trump's tariffs spark fears of global downturn - BBC
articles.description: It comes hours after US markets closed the day with the worst losses since 2020.
articles.content:
Unlike the countries we just mentioned, the UK is facing a 10% tariff on all goods heading to the US. But theres still a lot of uncertainty about what that could mean for people here.
